channel.title: No observer notification
channel.description:
#### What happened? Followed 16. It said you will follow 16 tonight. Then when night turned to day, it said nothing. Not even you were occupied or prevented. Just no further notification.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It shoulda said who 16 visited and who visited 16 Or that I was occupied Or prevented Or literally ANYTHING
#### Steps to reproduce: Only happened once
#### Comments: Devs, go into the last game that I played. Im getting offline for a while so it should be my last game. It happened N1
Oh also if you go into my last game, either the assassin or reaper had a penis for his deathnote. So you can see that too.

item.title: No observer notification
item.dc:creator: JanoRis
item.description:
this happens a lot lately with all classes

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/debauch-not-giving-feedback/11513

On the 2nd post in the link i have a summary of several other Bug reports with the same thing. So far we got no answer if this is being looked into

Read full topic

item.title: No observer notification
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I see. I’m not sure what then.

Read full topic

item.title: No observer notification
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
No there was only a reaper. I actually accused him of being a fool because you jailed him the night I observed him, you had to correct me. But regardless, if he’s a fool and hides, I would get a notification, like the notification I got when you jailed him. I mean it literally said nothing at the end of the night. Last thing it ever said was you will follow 16 tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: No observer notification
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I was actually in that game too. I was prince and got recharged twice by the CWs.
And the person who drew the inappropriate Death note was the assassin.
Also was there a fool in that game? They might have hid.

Read full topic

Followed 16. It said you will follow 16 tonight. Then when night turned to day, it said nothing. Not even you were occupied or prevented. Just no further notification.
